text: Yeleswaram Mandal is one of the 64 mandals in East Godavari District of Andhra Pradesh. As per census 2011 https://censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/2814_PART_A_DCHB_EAST%20GODAVARI.pdf, there are 13 villages. == Demographics == Yeleswaram Mandal has total population of 77,965 as per the Census 2011 out of which 38,471 are males while 39,494 are females and the Average Sex Ratio of Yeleswaram Mandal is 1,027. The total literacy rate of Yeleswaram Mandal is 62.86%. The male literacy rate is 58.42% and the female literacy rate is 53.25%.https://eastgodavari.ap.gov.in/census/ == Towns and villages == === Villages === *Bhadravaram *East Lakshmipuram *J. Annavaram *Lakkavaram *Lingamparthi *Marriveedu *Peddanapalle *Peravaram *Ramanayyapeta *Siripuram *Tirumali *Yeleswaram *Yerravaram == See also == *List of mandals in Andhra Pradesh == References == Category:Mandals in East Godavari district
title: Yeleswaram Mandal
